snippet: Harvick moved into the third round of Nascar’s championship race with a victory Saturday night in the Bank of America 500 at Charlotte Motor Speedway.
abstract: Kevin Harvick moves into the third round of Nascar’s championship race with a victory in the Bank of America 500 at Charlotte Motor Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Harvick moved into the third round of Nascar’s championship race with a victory Saturday night in the Bank of America 500 at Charlotte Motor Speedway.

headline.main: Kevin Harvick Advances in the Sprint Cup After a Tense Race
headline.print_headline: Harvick Advances in the Sprint Cup After a Tense Race
